original_text: Then she could not continue to hide him. So she took a basket that was made from river grass. She painted the basket with tar, to keep the water out of it. Then she put her baby in the basket. She put the basket among the reeds at the edge of the river.
korean_text: 더 숨길 수 없게 되매 그를 위하여 갈대 상자를 가져다가 역청과 나무 진을 칠하고 아기를 거기 담아 나일 강 가 갈대 사이에 두고

sentences.original_text: Then she could not continue to hide him
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 더 이상 그를 숨길 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: that was made from river grass
She painted the basket with tar
to keep the water out of it
Then she put her baby in the basket
She put the basket among the reeds
at the edge of the river
